excerpt: Underwater fine-dining venue with panoramic views of tropical fish, manta rays & reef sharks.
detail_description: Ocean Restaurant at Resorts World Sentosa is an elegant underwater seafood bistro that offers stunning views of manta rays and sharks in expansive glass tanks. The restaurant has recently undergone a makeover, introducing a new menu curated by renowned chef Olivier Bellin. The modern-European seafood-focused menu features responsibly sourced seafood, local produce, and house-grown herbs.
name: OCEAN Restaurant
address: B1M, Equarius Hotel, 8 Sentosa Gateway, Resorts World Sentosa, Singapore 098269

detail_description: Tanjong Beach Club is a popular spot on Sentosa Island, just off the southern coast of Singapore. It's known for its vibrant party scene and chill-out atmosphere, making it a favorite among both partygoers and those looking to relax on daybeds by the sea. The club hosts weekly events like the Smack Beach Up series with lively DJs, ensuring that visitors can enjoy beats and drinks all night long.
name: Tanjong Beach Club

detail_description: Coastes is a pet-friendly beachfront bistro located on Sentosa's sandy stretch of beach in Singapore. It offers a diverse range of brunch favorites and desserts, making it a great spot to enjoy the waves crashing against the shore. The casual open-air setting makes it a family favorite with all-day breakfast options until 3 pm, proximity to parking, and dog-friendliness.
name: Coastes - Beach Bar & Restaurant | Siloso Beach, Sentosa

excerpt: Upscale, air-conditioned complex of hawker stalls offering grilled seafood, noodle dishes & curries.
detail_description: Malaysian Food Street is a charming recreation of Kampong Glam, Singapore's predominantly Malaysian neighborhood, located at Bull Ring inside Resorts World Sentosa. This upscale complex features hawker stalls offering a variety of Malay dishes, from basic chicken and rice to more exotic options like satay sticks and noodle soups such as laksa. The colorful shop houses and wooden tables create an old-town charm where visitors can savor traditional flavors from the Malay Peninsula while enjoying the vibrant atmosphere.
name: Malaysian Food Street

detail_description: Trapizza, located at Rasa Sentosa Resort and Spa, has undergone a revamp to cater to families with energetic kids. The beachfront location offers ample space for children to play in the sand, while a larger water play area and dedicated play zone provide additional entertainment. The menu features family-sharing items like the Wagyu Beef Burger and customizable 16-inch thin-crust pizzas.
name: Trapizza

detail_description: Panamericana, situated at the Sentosa Golf Club in Singapore, offers breathtaking views of the South China Sea. The spacious venue provides entertainment for kids and a diverse menu that includes Argentinian and Latin American flavors with a focus on meats and grills. The bar serves an impressive selection of cocktails, wines, and spirits, as well as non-alcoholic options.
name: Panamericana
address: 27 Bukit Manis Rd, Sentosa Golf Club, Singapore 099892

detail_description: table65 at Resorts World Sentosa is a casual fine-dining restaurant led by the renowned Dutch chef Richard van Oostenbrugge. The restaurant offers modern European cuisine with French and Japanese influences, served from a communal chefs table where diners can interact with the chefs. The menu features innovative dishes like Foie gras kombu-jime and Coral Trout, as well as the popular Apple dessert drizzled in salted caramel.
name: table65

detail_description: Located in W Singapore - Sentosa Cove, SKIRT is a renowned restaurant offering a romantic dining experience. The restaurant is celebrated for its prime cuts of meat and sustainably sourced seafood prepared on the Parrilla grill. With international flavors and premium cuts from various countries, SKIRT promises a unique culinary journey. After indulging in their delectable dishes, guests can take a leisurely stroll along Quayside Isle to enjoy the bayfront ambience with yacht docks and bars.
name: SKIRT Restaurant

detail_description: If you're in search of a serene dining experience, Cassia is the perfect destination to unwind while savoring exquisite Cantonese cuisine with a modern flair. Nestled on Sentosa Island, this charming restaurant offers an enticing dim sum menu from noon to 2 pm daily, featuring comforting dishes like shredded chicken porridge and innovative takes on classic favorites such as siew mai topped with abalone and steamed prawn dumplings paired with asparagus.
name: Cassia

excerpt: Hawaiian-themed bar & water sports center with a swimming pool, a restaurant & DJs after dark.
detail_description: Located on Sentosa Island in Singapore, Ola Beach Club is a Hawaiian-themed bar and water sports center that offers a unique experience for visitors. The club features a swimming pool, restaurant, and hosts DJs after dark. The venue is designed with bamboo, ferns, and palm fronds to create an authentic beach island atmosphere. With beautiful alfresco seating providing panoramic views of the beach, it's the perfect place to relax after enjoying water sports adventures.
name: Ola Beach Club

detail_description: THE CLIFF is a charming Italian restaurant located at Sofitel Singapore Sentosa Resort & Spa, offering an authentic dining experience with meticulous attention to detail and warm hospitality. Situated by the seaside, diners can enjoy captivating views of merchant vessels coming into port, adding to the maritime charm of the location. The menu features classic Italian dishes such as pastas and pizzas prepared to exacting standards, along with special events that showcase regional Italian cuisine.
name: THE CLIFF

detail_description: Sabio by the Sea, Tapas Bar & Grill is a popular dining spot in Singapore that offers an authentic Spanish culinary experience. Located at Quayside Isle, this restaurant was one of the pioneers in introducing traditional Spanish tapas to the city. Over time, its menu has expanded to include larger grilled dishes cooked using the Josper Grill, known for infusing food with a delightful smoky flavor.
name: Sabio by the Sea, Tapas Bar & Grill

detail_description: The Kitchen Table is a must-visit spot for a luxurious breakfast or brunch on a tropical island. The restaurant features petite menu cards placed on clip-stands along the buffet line, offering dishes prepared by chefs at six live cooking stations. Customer favorites include the Octopus Salad on Toast with Jamon Crumbs and the Duck and Scallop Noodle soup, inspired by a famous Thai dish from Bondi Beach in Sydney.
name: the kitchen table

detail_description: Osia Steak and Seafood Grill, established in 2003 by Chef Scott Webster, draws inspiration from the ocean to blend Australian and Asian flavors. The restaurant is renowned for its Australian cuisine prepared by a talented team. A must-try dish is the Stone Hearth Flatbread, freshly baked in a wood-fired oven with a delightful crisp crust and airy texture. Osia's menu highlights include Stockyard Beef, featuring Black Angus Tomahawk Steak cooked to perfection and served with fresh greens.
name: Osia Steak and Seafood Grill
address: L2, Crockfords Tower, 8 Sentosa Gateway, Resorts World Sentosa, Singapore 098269

detail_description: Feng Shui Inn is a top-notch fine-dining restaurant offering authentic Cantonese cuisine. Led by experienced Hong Kong Chef Li Kwok Kwong, the restaurant presents an extensive menu featuring classic dishes like char siew and dim sum, as well as nourishing double-boiled soups and fresh seafood. The open kitchen allows diners to witness the skilled chefs in action as they prepare delectable traditional dishes.
name: Feng Shui Inn
address: Equarius Hotel, 8 Sentosa Gateway, Resorts World Sentosa, Singapore 098269

detail_description: Nestled within the serene grounds of Equarius Hotel, Tangerine offers a tranquil dining escape from the bustling crowds of Sentosa. This charming restaurant embraces a farm-to-table philosophy, showcasing an array of Thai-inspired dishes crafted by renowned Chef Ian Kittichai. With fresh herbs sourced directly from their own garden and ingredients like whole grains, vibrant fruits, and premium meats, each meal is designed to rejuvenate your spirit after a long day.
name: Tangerine
address: L1 Equarius Hotel, Sentosa Gateway, Resorts World Sentosa, 8, Singapore 098269

detail_description: Syun is a Japanese restaurant located at Resorts World Sentosa, known for its Nouvelle Japanese cuisine created by renowned chef Hal Yamashita. The restaurant offers a unique dining experience by blending traditional Japanese culinary techniques with Western influences. Syun's menu features fresh sushi, sashimi, and tender meats expertly combined using contemporary cooking methods to create innovative flavors. Diners can also enjoy premium alcohol selections including exclusive sake and rare Japanese whiskeys.
name: Syun
address: L2, Hotel Michael, 8 Sentosa Gateway, Resorts World Sentosa, Singapore 098269

detail_description: Rumours Beach Club, located at Siloso Beach in Singapore, offers a unique beach experience with its three swimming pools and various designated areas such as the VIP Area, Cabana Area, Beachfront Area, Indoor Area, Outdoor Area, and Alfresco Area that can be tailored for events of any size. Whether it's a private romantic dinner or a lively party, this beach club provides an ideal setting for all types of gatherings.
name: Rumours Beach Club

detail_description: TEPPAN is a Japanese restaurant that offers a unique experience of food preparation, cocktail mixing and desserts all done using the finest ingredients flown in from Japan daily. The teppanyaki tables are a must-visit for any food lover, while the burgers and steak dishes are also highly recommended. Reservations are essential as Teppan can get very busy!
name: TEPPAN By Chef Yonemura

detail_description: Priv @ Keppel Bay is a renowned establishment in Singapore's food and beverage scene, with its captivating location on the city's only private island. The restaurant offers unobstructed views of boats and yachts floating on turquoise waters, creating a serene atmosphere accompanied by the gentle sound of waves lapping the dock. With 7 outlets across Singapore, Prive provides a variety of clearly marked vegan and plant-based options on their menu, including dishes made with Beyond Burger and Impossible meat.
name: Priv @ Keppel Bay
address: 2 Keppel Bay Vista, #01-03, Marina at Keppel Bay, Singapore 098382

excerpt: Chic rooms, some with strait views, in an upmarket hotel offering an outdoor pool, a gym & a bar.
detail_description: The Outpost Hotel Sentosa is a chic and stylish upscale property in Sentosa, offering exclusive accommodations for adults. The hotel features 193 stylish guest rooms with a modern design inspired by Singapore's black and white bungalows. Guests can choose between pool, island, or sea view rooms and enjoy deluxe treatment throughout their stay. The pool deck offers a stunning place to relax with cocktails at the swim-up bar, as well as a lazy river for added enjoyment.
name: The Outpost Hotel Sentosa

detail_description: Blue Lotus Singapore (Chinese Eating House) is a modern Chinese and Singaporean restaurant that offers a contemporary twist on traditional Cantonese and local Chinese dishes. Founded in 2015, the restaurant is known for its innovative take on Chinese cuisine, pushing culinary boundaries to bring excellent food to the table every time.
name: Blue Lotus Singapore (Chinese Eating House)

detail_description: Mykonos On The Bay is a restaurant located in Sentosa Cove, Singapore. It is an extension of the owners' experiences in Greek Tavernas around the Hellenic Islands in Greece. As part of the Mangiatutto Group of Restaurants, they focus on serving authentic Greek cuisine using fresh and high-quality ingredients.
name: Mykonos On The Bay
address: 31 Ocean Way, #01-10, Quayside Isle, Sentosa Cove, Singapore 098375

detail_description: Harry's is a popular sports bar with plenty of outlets spread throughout Singapore. It has a great selection of drinks on tap, as well as an impressive food menu that includes kid-friendly options.
name: Harry's Resorts World Sentosa

detail_description: Located on the picturesque island of Sentosa in southern Singapore, Bedrock Origin is an upscale dining spot that offers a diverse menu featuring old-school favorites like grilled lobster tail and steaks alongside innovative dishes such as grilled kingfish collar and plant-based beef wellington. The restaurant stands out for catering to vegans with its offerings. Notable menu items include the A4 Wagyu ribeye and the impressive tomahawk steak.
name: Bedrock Origin - Steakhouse @ Sentosa
address: Oasia Resort Sentosa Hotel, 23 Bch Vw Rd, #01-02, Palawan Ridge, Singapore 098679

detail_description: CHIFA is a unique restaurant that offers a fusion of Peruvian and Chinese cuisine. The menu features a variety of dishes such as Chinese chicken, fish, pork, and vegetable creations prepared with Peruvian culinary techniques by Chef Ruben Rodrigo Serrano Cabrera. The restaurant's vibrant dining space is adorned with colorful designs inspired by both China and Peru, providing an authentic atmosphere for diners. Visitors have been impressed by the exceptional quality of the food at CHIFA.
name: CHIFA!
address: L2, Crockfords Tower, 8 Sentosa Gateway, Resorts World Sentosa, Singapore 098269

detail_description: Soi Social, located on Sentosa Island within Resorts World Sentosa, offers a unique blend of Chef Ian Kittichai's innovative Thai dishes and handcrafted cocktails in a space that combines Asian tradition with French romance. The menu captures the flavorful essence of Thailand with a balance of sweet, sour, salty, and spicy flavors. While the food is generally good, some patrons have noted occasional service issues. However, the set lunches offered during weekdays are recommended for those visiting the area.
name: Soi Social
address: L2, Hotel Michael, 8 Sentosa Gateway, Resorts World Sentosa, Singapore 098269

excerpt: Premium resort with themed hotels, plus a theme park, an aquarium, a convention center & a casino.
detail_description: Resorts World Sentosa is a luxurious resort located on the edge of a tropical rainforest in Singapore. The Equarius Hotel offers suites and deluxe rooms with balconies providing views of the Straits or jungle, some featuring private pools. Guests have easy access to Sentosa Island's attractions, including Universal Studios Singapore and various beaches. The resort also features an interactive museum that takes visitors on a journey through the Maritime Silk Route, with themed galleries and interactive displays.
name: Resorts World Sentosa

excerpt: Luxe quarters in a high-end hotel with designer furnishing, 4 restaurant/bars, a spa & event space.
detail_description: Capella Singapore is a luxurious hotel located on Sentosa Island, offering upscale accommodations with designer furnishings. The resort features 112 rooms, including a spacious premier room and a grand three-bedroom colonial manor with exclusive amenities. Guests can indulge in fine dining at four restaurants, such as Cassia for Cantonese cuisine and Chefs Table for private dining experiences. The hotel's spa, Auriga, provides holistic treatments in serene surroundings, including private garden treatment rooms and vitality pools.
name: Capella Singapore

excerpt: Romantic dinner cruises aboard an elegant tall ship with sunset multi-course meals.
detail_description: Experience a unique and romantic dining adventure aboard the Royal Albatross, Singapore's only four-mast, 22-sail luxury Tall Ship. Enjoy a picturesque sunset dinner cruise with a three-course meal, live entertainment, and breathtaking views of the city skyline from the water. Perfect for couples or small groups seeking an unforgettable and romantic ambiance under the canopy of sails.
name: Royal Albatross - Luxury Tall Ship

excerpt: Famous chef Jol Robuchon's posh French spot in Resorts World Sentosa featuring a vast wine list.
detail_description: Jol Robuchon Restaurant, located in Resorts World Sentosa, is a luxurious French dining spot by the renowned chef Jol Robuchon. The restaurant has proudly maintained its three Michelin stars for consecutive years, offering innovative and beautifully presented French fine dining dishes. The opulent ambiance of the restaurant resembles an extravagant dining room with grand chandeliers and lavish dcor.
name: Jol Robuchon Restaurant

detail_description: 1-Altitude Coast is a newly opened beach club oasis in Singapore, offering stunning sunset views, elegant interiors, and an elevated party experience with international and local DJs. It features a communal meat and seafood-forward menu designed for sharing. As Singapore's pioneer multi-concept dining and lifestyle destination, 1-Altitude houses the world's Highest Alfresco Lounge, promising fine dining and endless entertainment under one roof.
name: 1-Altitude Coast
address: The Outpost Hotel, 10 Artillery Ave, #07-01, Sentosa Island, Singapore 099951

excerpt: Elegant bar at the Capella Singapore, offering spirits & tapas, plus a patio area & sunset vistas.
detail_description: Bob's Bar is a Cuban-inspired establishment located at the Capella Singapore, offering a serene setting to enjoy spirits and tapas while taking in sunset vistas. The semi-alfresco bar provides ample open space, lounge chairs, and an indoor area with plush armchairs and bar stools. With a nod to Cuba, the venue features a Latin jazz band performing midweek to Friday and serves up Cuban-influenced cocktails such as Bob's fresh pressed mojito and the Six Star Swizzle.
name: Bob's Bar

detail_description: FOC Sentosa is a trendy and casual spot located on Tanjong Beach at Sentosa Island, just off the southern shore of Singapore. This vibrant area offers an array of tourist attractions, including theme parks like Universal Studios and Madame Tussauds, historical sites such as Fort Siloso, and Southeast Asia's first 4D theatre at Sentosa 4D Adventureland.
name: FOC by the Beach

detail_description: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Sentosa, Le Faubourg offers a delightful slice of Parisian charm right in Singapore. This French restaurant is renowned for its homemade and authentic cuisine, all served within an elegant yet cozy atmosphere that captures the essence of Parisian life. Whether you're planning a leisurely breakfast, brunch with friends, or a romantic dinner date, Le Faubourg provides the perfect backdrop for any occasion.
name: Le Faubourg
address: 2 Gunner Lane #01-02 Mess Hall Block 17, opp The Barracks Hotel, Singapore 099567

detail_description: Equarius Lounge offers a pleasant stay with great service and impressive rooms that are sure to be loved by all. While the staff training may need some improvement, the overall experience is better than at other hotels in the area.
name: Equarius Lounge

detail_description: TungLok Heen is a renowned restaurant in Sentosa and Singapore, offering traditional Chinese cuisine with a contemporary twist. Helmed by celebrity chefs, the restaurant presents an array of authentic Asian creations alongside popular Singaporean favorites like Oyster Omelette, Laksa, Chilli Crab, and Char Kway Teow. The elegant interior combines Mediterranean and Zen-like ambiance to complement the refined and decadent dishes served.
name: TungLok Heen
address: 26 Sentosa Gateway, #02-142/143, Resorts World Sentosa - Hotel Michael, Singapore 098269

detail_description: Tino's Pizza Resorts World Sentosa is known for its ever-evolving menu, featuring signature items like the Mr. Tino and Duck Caponata pizzas. The restaurant offers a mix of traditional and unique flavors, with options like truffle spaghetti and margherita pizza receiving positive reviews. Despite occasional wait times during peak hours, the convenient location and decent service make it a popular choice for visitors exploring Resorts World Sentosa.
name: Tino's Pizza Resorts World Sentosa

detail_description: LeNu Chef Wai's Noodle Bar at VivoCity offers affordable and customizable noodle bowls with a choice of braised beef broth or signature pork bone soup. Diners can select from three types of noodles and various meat options to create their ideal bowl. The restaurant provides a pleasant dining environment, with seating near the water playground and attentive staff who offer storage containers for belongings.
name: LeNu Chef Wai's Noodle Bar  at VivoCity

detail_description: Kwee Zeen, formerly known as The Terrace at The Sentosa Resort & Spa, is a culinary gem that specializes in Pan-Asian delights. This all-day dining buffet restaurant boasts both indoor and alfresco seating options, allowing guests to enjoy stunning views of the pool or the South China Sea while indulging in an array of delectable dishes.
name: KWEE ZEEN

excerpt: Elegant quarters in an old-world hotel with a restaurant, an outdoor pool & free walking tours.
detail_description: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa is a luxurious accommodation located in Singapore, just a short distance from Siloso Beach and Adventure Cove Waterpark. The hotel offers elegant rooms with old-world charm, some featuring swim-up pools and executive lounge access. Guests can enjoy impeccable service, free WiFi, and complimentary private parking. The hotel's heritage building was previously a British army barracks and has been meticulously transformed into a homely retreat with vintage elements such as moulded columns and timber louvered windows.
name: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa

detail_description: LeBAR, located at Sentosa's Sofitel Hotel & Resort, offers a plush and inviting ambiance inspired by colonial-era pavilions. The venue is perfect for intimate conversations over an exhaustive menu of bespoke cocktails. Guests can enjoy live music and stunning views of the lobby's blown-glass chandelier or the aquamarine pool and South China Sea. The outdoor pavilion lounge provides a serene setting to savor indulgent high teas and crafted cocktails while taking in the enchanting view.
name: LEBAR

detail_description: eM By The Marina is a charming alfresco cafe and bar nestled in Sentosa Cove Village, offering a laid-back atmosphere for families to relax and enjoy. With its picturesque waterfront location overlooking the yacht-filled bay, it's an ideal spot to savor a variety of delectable dishes while soaking in the serene views. Whether you're looking for a leisurely breakfast, lunch, or dinner, this all-day dining venue provides an extensive menu featuring local delights and international cuisine.
name: eM By The Marina
address: 1 Cove Ave, #02-14, Sentosa Cove Arrival Plaza, Singapore 098537

detail_description: Good Old Days Food Court, established in late 2011, is a popular spot for parents to grab their morning coffee while the kids play at the outdoor playground. The staff are accommodating to little ones and there's an air-conditioned space with highchairs and coloring sheets inside. This halal-certified food court offers local delights at affordable prices on two levels, featuring grilled and roasted fare on the first level and local favorites on the second level.
name: Good Old Days

detail_description: Royal Taj @ Village Hotel is an exquisite Indian restaurant housed in a restored colonial building on Sentosa Island. It's a popular spot for special occasions, offering modern Indian cuisine with top-notch quality and a unique dining atmosphere. The menu is extensive, featuring traditional Indian flavors combined with global influences. Since its opening in early 2019, Royal Taj has gained widespread acclaim and was recognized as one of Sentosa's Best Restaurants in 2020.
name: Royal Taj @ Village Hotel
address: 2, block 16 Gunner Ln, #02-06, Singapore Mess Hall, Singapore 099567

excerpt: Polished hotel offering casual rooms with free W-Fi, plus outdoor pools & multiple dining options.
detail_description: Village Hotel Sentosa is a top choice for families seeking a luxurious yet affordable holiday experience in Singapore. The hotel boasts casual rooms with free Wi-Fi and multiple dining options. Its remarkable Pool Deck features four themed pools, catering to both adults and children. Conveniently located near Universal Studios, Adventure Cove, and Treetops Adventures, the hotel offers exciting activities for families such as sandcastle-building sessions and movie nights.
name: Village Hotel Sentosa
address: 10 Artillery Ave, #02-01 Palawan Ridge, Sentosa Island, Singapore 099951

detail_description: Ramen Dining Keisuke Tokyo is a delightful culinary gem nestled in Sentosa, Singapore, where traditional Japanese ramen meets innovative French cooking techniques. This unique establishment has redefined comfort food with its array of distinctive flavors, particularly the signature Lobster Broth Ramen that tantalizes taste buds with its rich and flavorful broth infused with lobster essence.
name: Ramen Dining Keisuke Tokyo (RWS)
address: 26 Sentosa Gateway, #B1-219/220, Resorts World Sentosa, Singapore 098138

detail_description: Embark on a delightful culinary journey at Native Kitchen, where the vibrant flavors of Asian and Polynesian cuisine come to life. This inviting eatery emphasizes communal dining, making it the perfect spot for gathering with friends and family. Indulge in their signature dishes like the Jumbo Satay Skewers, Kalbi Short Rib Loco Moco, and Misoyaki Butterfishall crafted from fresh ingredients that celebrate island-inspired tastes.
name: Native Kitchen - Asian Cuisine/Local Favourites @ Sentosa
address: 10 Artillery Avenue Sentosa Island, Lobby Level, Village Hotel at Sentosa, Singapore 099951

detail_description: Nestled within the luxurious Shangri-La Rasa Sentosa resort on Sentosa Island, Casserole is a must-visit restaurant offering a diverse array of meat-free dining options. The menu features an assortment of casseroles and chef's specials that are perfect for sharing.
name: Casserole
